## \textcolor{blue}{(a): Show that $\sum_i^n (X_i-\bar X)=0$}
\textbf{Answer:} 
$$ 
%% Comment -- Learn how to type a maths proof
% left aligned
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\begin{aligned}
\sum_{i=1}^n  (X_i - \bar X) 
&= \sum_{i=1}^n X_i - \sum_{i=1}^n \bar X \\
&= \sum_{i=1}^n X_i - n \bar X \\
&= \sum_{i=1}^n X_i - \sum_{i=1}^n X_i \\
&= 0
\end{aligned}
$$
